projects.title: YOKADX

projects.title: Quality KPI Dashboard
projects.currentPhase: Modular development of each QE Data Center KPI using the same structure: SharePoint data list, connected Power BI report, Power Apps main section and update form, plus optional Power Automate flows.

projects.title: DX Expenses
projects.currentPhase: The proposal for visualizing departmental expenses in Power BI has been validated. The report displays both monthly and accumulated spending and includes filters by department, fiscal quarter, and business unit.

projects.title: DX Hold (Hold Monitor System) - ME
projects.currentPhase: Final testing and user validation for FY25 will be completed, followed by full implementation and deployment of the FY25 version. Quick bug fixes and targeted improvements will also be addressed.

projects.title: Jsox Dashboard
projects.currentPhase: The project will begin by converting the database from XLS to XLSX using both provider and internal sources through the DX Team. The data will then be transformed to extract all required information. A dashboard visualization will be created based on the provided PPT. Pilot tests will be conducted, and the final solution will be delivered to the QDOC Team along with a walkthrough of its functionality.

projects.title: RoBot Innovation Zone
projects.currentPhase: The robot‚Äôs structure is now fully complete. The next step is to acquire the components needed for mobility, including motors, microcontrollers, and additional electronic parts. Once these materials are in place, functional testing will begin.

projects.currentPhase: Content is being developed for a campaign aimed at reducing unnecessary meetings and making better use of time. The initiative encourages innovation, digitalization, and continuous learning to keep our minds energized and growing.
